mapper.sql: id, resourceId, divId, actionScript, name, actionAlias, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_resource_action ( id, resourceId, divId, actionScript, name, actionAlias, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{resourceId}, #{divId}, #{actionScript}, #{name}, #{actionAlias}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{description} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mubs_resource_action
resourceId = #{resourceId},
divId = #{divId},
actionScript = #{actionScript},
name = #{name},
actionAlias = #{actionAlias},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
description = #{description},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE mubs_resource_action
resourceId = #{map.resourceId},
divId = #{map.divId},
actionScript = #{map.actionScript},
name = #{map.name},
actionAlias = #{map.actionAlias},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
description = #{map.description},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_resource_action ( id, resourceId, divId, actionScript, name, actionAlias, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, description ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.resourceId}, #{map.divId}, #{map.actionScript}, #{map.name}, #{map.actionAlias}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.description} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mubs_resource_action
and id in (#{condition.whereSql})
limit ${offset}, ${rows}

SELECT
FROM mubs_resource_action
AND id like '%#{id}%'
AND resourceId like '%#{resourceId}%'
AND divId like '%#{divId}%'
AND actionScript like '%#{actionScript}%'
AND name like '%#{name}%'
AND actionAlias like '%#{actionAlias}%'
AND creator like '%#{creator}%'
AND createDate like '%#{createDate}%'
AND lastModifier like '%#{lastModifier}%'
AND lastModDate like '%#{lastModDate}%'
AND description like '%#{description}%'
